about_the_game:
Explore Mars in AGRONOM, a Slavic Sci-Fi farming sim! Build a dacha (weekend house) for an elderly scientist. Master high-tech cultivation, use robots for automation, and craft in a cozy world 🧡

In the game AGRONOM you have to build a summer house for an elderly scientist on Mars from products created with resources extracted from the soil of Mars, as well as plants grown from seeds brought from Earth by the elderly scientist.

PLANT CULTIVATION

In AGRONOM you will be able to grow plants in specially designated places - greenhouses. In them you need to set up the right environmental conditions for the plant. A seed needs to be nurtured in an incubator and a seedling needs to be grown to fruit in a bed.

ROBOTIZATION

Automate plant cultivation, mining and production with robots! Configure helpers and machines however you want to minimize your routine.

BASE BUILDING

Develop your skills and increase the level of your base. Produce new materials to build new structures. You'll have to mine electricity and build electrical circuits, as well as keep track of your water consumption.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti, or AMD RX 470/RX 570, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is in development and minimum requirements may change.

short_description: Farm, build, and automate with robots to create a Martian paradise for Uncle Makar in AGRONOM 🧡
